inclusion.criterion: Subject is 2-80 years, any gender, race or ethnic group, inclusive.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject has a diagnosis of congenital facial palsy, isolated or combined with other congenital anomalies.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject is a family member of a patient with a diagnosis of congenital facial palsy, isolated or combined with other congenital anomalies.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject has the ability to travel to the NIH Clinical Center for admissions.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subject or subject s legal guardian is able to provide written informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has severe respiratory difficulties (i.e., requiring a tracheostomy or other assistive device to maintain respiration) or other disease manifestation that would interfere with the ability to comply with the requirements of this protocol and/or pose a severe anesthesia risk.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject has a psychiatric illness or neurological disease that would interfere with the ability to comply with the requirements of this protocol. This includes, but is not limited to, uncontrolled/untreated psychotic depression, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, substance abuse or dependence, antisocial personality disorder, or panic disorder.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject shows evidence of clinically significant cardiovascular, pulmonary, hepatic, renal, hematological, metabolic, or gastrointestinal disease, or has a condition that requires immediate surgical intervention.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Subject is pregnant during the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject or subject s legal guardian is unable or unwilling to provide consent or assent.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia and hypothyroidism. He smokes cigarette 1 pack per day for 40 years and alcohol consumption of 5 to 6 beers per week.
